summary: net: usb: fix possible use-after-free in smsc75xx_bind
details:
net: usb: fix possible use-after-free in smsc75xx_bind

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.13 by commit 14616c372a7be01a2fb8c56c9d8debd232b9e43d, it was introduced in version v5.12.9 by commit 70c886ac93f87ae7214a0c69151a28a8075dd95b. For more details please see the references link.
